channel.title: Projects on Davor Badrov
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Davor Badrov

item.title: Chess clock
item.description: This is a PWA I made with Preact (and preact-cli). It’s an open sourced chess clock. It has a 100/100 lighthouse score. The project is hosted with Firebase and can be seen here. You can check it’s source here.

item.title: Geocoding service
item.description: A project I made in colaboration with Rade Koroman, my budy who is a designer. It’s a free and open source solution with an UI for getting coordinates for locations. You can check it here, and it’s source here. It’s a frontend only project made in React and it uses OpenStreetMap’s Nominatim API free API for geolocation (getting coordinates out of locations). The app was bootstraped using create-react-app.
